description:
Keep your essentials close at hand. The Seymour Oceanweave handlebar bags have enough room for your necessities, and the waterproof fabric is dependable when the rain starts falling. The P4 version is ideal for bikes with less clearance between tire and handlebar.

  • Oceanweave® fabric is made with reclaimed fishnets
  • Water-resistant stiching and a polyurethane coating keep contents dry
  • Universal strap and buckle mounting system
  • Zippered rear pocket provides quick access to essentials
name: Axiom Seymour Oceanweave P7 Handlebar Bag
